checkDoesNotApply.description: Debug information to show when the resource is a data URI
checkDoesNotApply.message: Check does not apply for data URI: $1

nosniff.description: Report message when the 'x-content-type-options' header value is not 'nosniff'

shouldInclude.description: Report message when the response doesn't include the header 'x-content-type-options'
